author: angela
msg: JCR-2004: Update SPI locking to match JCR 2.0
JCR-2097: Broke lock tests in jcr2spi after the JCR 2.0 upgrade
- adjusted spi2jcr LockInfo implementation. that doesn't yet fix all broken tests... but those related to lock ownership
- deprecated the old LockInfoImpl constructor in spi-commons

author: spoole
msg: updated katoview to use new modified API (ie removed last vestiges  of "DTFJ")

author: clement
msg: Reduce drastically the size of the manipulator.
It does no more embed Xerces, but rely on any Sax parser implementation exporting org.xml.sax.
The main result is the reduction of the online manipulator size to 150Kb (instead of 1Mb).
Fix the junit4OSGi notice file : it does not includes OSGi code
